name: Princess!
description:
Auto Slash!

Touch enemy to slay with Left/Right arrow. 

Keyboard Controls W  or UPJUMPA/D or Left/RightMove and slay  (player will slay automatically)Down or S
Summon brickSpace or Right CtrlUse MAGIC (Player 2 uses Right Ctrl)8/NUM8Princess jump7/9 or NUM4/NUM6Princess moveEnterSelect/PauseAltSwitch SOUND mode (BGM+SFX/SFX/None) Backspace ReturnC Show credits  ( On Title screen)SOpen Shop  ( On Title screen)
*not available in HTML versionLeft/RightSelect Yes/No (On Shop screen)
*not available in HTML version
TABToggle full screen/ window mode SNES Controller Controls

To return on Title screen  during game you can press Start then Left.

Kyyaaa! Slay the enemies or she dies. 

Up to 3 players in local mutiplayer. Upgrade your weapons to improve your score and reach the end screen.

Princess is inspired by the early Arcade games of the 8 bit era, as you progress through  the game and unlock power ups new enemies appear.

Download the Game on your PC or Mac for the full experience with controller and local multiplayer support. 

Or play on the go with wifi multiplayer on the Android version.

(*friends to play with not included)
